compose_with_a_grid::text_card_9::text: Congratulations, you've learned the basic steps to compose photos with a grid. Practice your new skill in the activity below.
compose_with_a_grid::text_card_0::text: Using a grid to improve composition is the most basic concept a photographer needs to understand. This lesson will teach you to look at your photo as a grid.
compose_with_a_grid::text_card_8::text: Fill the entire frame with visual information. Use the grid to organize that information and create more compelling photos.
compose_with_a_grid::text_card_4::text: If the photo is a landscape, this line is often used to establish the horizon in a grid.
compose_with_a_grid::text_card_1::text: Think of your photo as if it is made up of nine equal rectangles. Strong visuals use all the rectangles in the grid to tell the story.
compose_with_a_grid::text_card_6::text: To use a grid most effectively, the vertical and horizontal lines should work together to define the frame.
compose_with_a_grid::preview_card_2::hea: This line shows the bottom third of the frame.
compose_with_a_grid::preview_card_0::hea: Placing the grid on this photo divides one image into nine equal areas.
compose_with_a_grid::preview_card_6::hea: The rectangles in color show how visual information is organized by the grid.
compose_with_a_grid::preview_card_3::hea: This line shows the top third of the frame.
compose_with_a_grid::preview_card_1::hea: Do not place your subject in the middle with no thought to the rest of the grid.
compose_with_a_grid::text_card_3::text: This grid is not intended to help you center your photo. Let's look at how the lines of the grid work together to help you compose better photos.
compose_with_a_grid::preview_card_4::hea: Note how important elements of the composition are placed in the grid.
compose_with_a_grid::title: Compose with a Grid
compose_with_a_grid::text_card_5::text: If the photo is a portrait, the subject's eyes are usually placed on the top horizontal line when framing with a grid. As you practice this more you may find that sometimes the bottom line works better.
compose_with_a_grid::preview_card_5::hea: In this photo main subjects complete entirely within the frame.
compose_with_a_grid::text_card_2::text: Most smartphones allow you to turn this grid on in your Camera app. Use the grid when practicing these lessons.
compose_with_a_grid::text_card_7::text: Clearly define the edges of your frame. Try to have important shapes complete within the frame.
